verses.roman:
premāveśe nṛtya kari' ha-ilā mūrcchite
acetana hañā teṅha paḍilā bhūmite

synonyms: prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; nṛtya kari'—dancing; ha-ilā mūrcchite—fainted; acetana hañā—being unconscious; teṅha—he; paḍilā—fell; bhūmite—on the ground.
translation: While dancing in ecstatic love, Śrī Gopāla fainted and fell to the ground unconscious.
